ygData.msgSnippet: Chimera heard the order, but something caught his eye in the sky. Panicked, Leo took control and called Hydras. Chimera: Negatives! NEGATIVES! THE BAD BOTS

Chimera heard the order, but something caught his eye in the sky. 
Panicked, Leo took control and called Hydras.

Chimera: Negatives! NEGATIVES! THE BAD BOTS COME! THEY WANT TO TEARS 
US AND RIPS US APART, YES! but we won't lets them... we will Wrench 
their puny bolts out of their circuits... we will DEVOURS THEM! 
YAARGH!!!!!!!!!!

In beast mode, Chimera took flight and got ready to welcome the 
Minions as they approached Predacon base.

In vehicle mode, Ragebomber targetted the base and fired many small 
concussion bombs on it.

Ragebomber: Sky-Eye, dispatch and find Bloodblade!

Immediately, the diminutive Sky-Eye zoomed away and left the group 
to its dirty work.

Firewhip: Now we get to slay them for good! How I waited this moment!

The four remaining Minions landed and transformed in Robot mode, 
Ragebomber a huge and purple Bot, Klash ready to use his various 
techniques, Crumblefish patiently charging his two beam weapons and 
Firewhip waiting for the Preds to move...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hdyras,
> 
> Hydras opened his com link to Azure and said "Go to the base and 
get 
> contact with Perceptor, he would know what to do" after that he 
> opened com link with Chimeara"Chimera, wher're you ???? do 
something 
> useful and move to this cordinates: IF I DON'T SEE YOU HERE IN FEW 
> CYCLES i'LL PERSONALY KILL YOU!!!"
> 
> Hydras landed next to SharpClaws and Wolfstein and Roared"What are 
> you expecting fools, that UNICRONS MINIONS ARRIVE???? OPEN FIRE 
> AGAINST THOSE PIECE OF METAL!!!!"
> 
> Perceptor
> Received the com link and looking to StarFlier he said "Proces can 
> continue alone, babe, just keep an eye in him and told me when 
he's 
> ready to fight"
> 
> PErceptor run the base defences and started to sunk the base 
inside 
> the volcano. If Asure liked came in he had to be hurry.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Robo, Airly, this is your cue to take a squad and bash some 
> > bolts!
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Unicron's propulsors came to a step as he settled in the Moon's 
> > orbit. He stood there, watching the energon-bloated jewel that 
was 
> > Earth. He zoomed his malevolent attention on the three 
> Cybertronian 
> > bases and decided that these were the objectives. A low roar 
arose 
> > as he began to speak. His voice would be transmitted all over 
the 
> > planet.
> > 
> > Unicron: I claim this planet as mine. Any Transformer on it will 
> be 
> > destroyed unless they choose to become my servants. Also, if you 
> > part with the Matrix, I may spare your spark.
> > 
> > The Transmission ended abruptly. The Chaos Bringer turned to his 
> > many Minions.
> > 
> > Unicron: We will attack in waves. Kill all you find, unless they 
> > offer their alliegeance. Sky-Eye, find Bloodblade.
> > 
> > The first squad, the Flaming Eye of Morgoth (hint hint!), left 
on 
> > that instant for Predacon base. They were Firewhip, Klash, 
> > Crumblefish, Sky-Eye and the big Ragebomber. They would be there 
> > soon...
